text: Buner District is a district in the Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province of Pakistan. The major language spoken in the region is Pashto. Most people are Muslim who follow Islam. ==Tehsils of Bunner== * Bunner Tehsil * Daggar Tehsil * Gadezai Tehsil * Gagra Tehsil * Chagharzai Tehsil * Chamla Tehsil * Totalai Tehsil Category:Districts of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa
title: Buner District
